#!/bin/bash

set -euo pipefail

apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y
apt-get install -y curl

if [[ -z "$REPO_URL" ]]; then
  echo "REPO_URL environment variable is not set."
  exit 1
fi

echo "-- Downloading project defaults from: $REPO_URL"

cd /mnt/server

curl -fsSL "$REPO_URL/projectdefaults/package.json" -o package.json
curl -fsSL "$REPO_URL/projectdefaults/index.js" -o index.js

echo "-- Server installed successfully"
